publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4522 Ms Sandra White: Windsave (Glasgow) - European Environment Business Award Winner—That the Parliament sends its warmest congratulations to the Glasgow-based company, Windsave, which recently became the UK winner of the prestigious European Business Awards for the Environment; notes that the award was for the formulation of a compact wind turbine designed for private homes and offices which delivers renewable electricity directly into the mains supply; recognises that Windsave beat off competition from 139 other entries, and suggests that this level of Scottish expertise, invention and resourcefulness, especially in this field, augurs well for Scotland becoming the renewables capital of Europe.

S2M-4522 Ms Sandra White: Windsave (Glasgow) - European Environment Business Award Winner—That the Parliament sends its warmest congratulations to the Glasgow-based company, Windsave, which recently became the UK winner of the prestigious European Business Awards for the Environment; notes that the award was for the formulation of a compact wind turbine designed for private homes and offices which delivers renewable electricity directly into the mains supply; recognises that Windsave beat off competition from 139 other entries, and suggests that this level of Scottish expertise, invention and resourcefulness, especially in this field, augurs well for Scotland becoming the renewables capital of Europe. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Shiona Baird*, Pauline McNeill*, Sarah Boyack*
S2M-4522 Windsave (Glasgow) - European Environment Business Award Winner (lodged on 8 June 2006) Alex Neil*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4522 Windsave (Glasgow) - European Environment Business Award Winner (lodged on 8 June 2006) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4522 Windsave (Glasgow) - European Environment Business Award Winner (lodged on 8 June 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4522 Windsave (Glasgow) - European Environment Business Award Winner (lodged on 8 June 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*
S2M-4522 Windsave (Glasgow) - European Environment Business Award Winner (lodged on 8 June 2006) Cathy Peattie*
